We have just passed over the only railroad in this whole rich province,
a short line between a coal mine & the river.
When I left Manila Debby had just received some letters from the girls
fron Honolulu.
She mailed them to me Iron Baguio in order that I would
have the setters in case the clipper for Hongkong was delayed another day
but it was not ,
so the letters followed me to China. To-day the plane
